remarks.format: ## Remarks WML 轉譯是在兩個階段。WML rendering is done in two phases. 在第一個階段中，產生器的所有呼叫都會經過都分析的正確性。In the first phase, all calls to the renderer are analyzed for correctness. 在第二個階段中，則執行呈現。In the second phase, the rendering is performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項的用戶端識別碼是超過 16 個字元，ASP.NET 會替代唯一對應的簡短名稱。If the client identifier of a control is longer than 16 characters, ASP.NET substitutes a uniquely mapped short name. 對應的用戶端識別碼，在頁面上的所有參考，導致相同的回傳，不論對應。All references to the client identifier on the page are mapped, resulting in the same postback regardless of mapping. 其也加密用戶端 Id，基於安全性理由必須加密。 can also scramble client IDs that must be encrypted for security reasons.
